prediction.health: You will feel healthy and filled with energy. But it makes sense to follow a strict diet pattern and take proper rest. add yoga and light exercises in your fitness regime.
prediction.emotions: You shall feel optimistic, hopeful and futuristic today. Your ability to comprehend new concepts will be heightened.
prediction.profession: This is an excellent time on professional front. Today you can take any decision and can start any new project independently. There are strong chances of financial gains from unexpected sources. Appreciation and recognition will also bring along new opportunities.
prediction.luck: Today will be a day of fortune for you. You are free to take any decisions and start new projects.
prediction.personal_life: An opportunity for a romance may arise which is likely to be thrilling, though short-lived. Reaching out to an older relative or a mature, experienced person can prove to be mutually beneficial. You shall be sensitive to the feelings and needs of others.
prediction.travel: You will feel like socializing and being friendly. You may take up a sudden journey today.

prediction.health: Anxiety can be the cause of some health related problems today. You tend to worry too much. Boost your immunity and mental strength with yoga and meditation.
prediction.emotions: There is some possibility that you may unintentionally hurt the feelings of someone. You will be able to ease up the pressure you have put yourself through lately.
prediction.profession: There are possibilities of some ups and downs but by using your creativity and intelligence, you will improve your chances to get good results. Your responsibilities and influence at work may increase. The day will be average from financial point of view.
prediction.luck: Today is a good day to make wise choices. You will start thinking more about your future.
prediction.personal_life: Opportunities for a romance are apparent- but will be short lived. The environment at home front would be somewhat demanding. You will need to handle the situations rather tactfully. However children would be the source of happiness.
prediction.travel: You may have to travel for official or study purpose. Be careful with your food and water when you are travelling.

prediction.health: You may have pain in lower neck, shoulders and arms. Health of younger siblings could also cause tension. Ayurvedic treatment or massage can get you relief. Don’t indulge in any kind of addiction.
prediction.emotions: Your mood is solemn and rather self-critical. This is a good time to take stock of your life and problems and to determine your next steps.
prediction.profession: This is a day of considerable frustration and all your efforts will be thwarted. Opposition will arise from people who are working at the senior levels. No positive work will be done. You shall need a large dose of patience today.
prediction.luck: Today is not your favorable day. You may have a tough time dealing with delays and failures. Prayers will help you a lot.
prediction.personal_life: You might feel bounded by many things today. Tensions will increase. You may have short temper and differences with younger siblings are also likely. Over expectations could irritate you. Stay calm, as small actions can turn violent today.
prediction.travel: Tours will be troublesome. Be cautious while traveling. Chances of getting injured are high so travel with utter care.

prediction.health: Health will be excellent. You shall feel active and energetic. Do not indulge in overeating.
prediction.emotions: You will be happy and contended. You will enjoy whatever comes your way.
prediction.profession: Today is a very good day for businessmen and professionals. You shall gain profits and customers. Those in service can expect good news relating to a rise in salary or a promotion. However do not spend impulsively.
prediction.luck: You will feel very lucky today with most of your materialistic wishes coming true.
prediction.personal_life: You will spend on items which shall increase the comforts of your family members. Relations with your spouse/beloved will improve. You may surprise them with a gift. Social life will be good.
prediction.travel: Today is a good time to travel. You shall get happiness and relaxation from trips with family.

prediction.health: There might be some expenses on medical diagnosis. You may even have to visit a hospital. You may suffer from food poisoning. Carelessness in eating habits can lead to gastric troubles, which can be resolved with little changes in your diet.
prediction.emotions: Today you will need to keep your emotions in check and abstain from indulging in any kind of erratic behavior.
prediction.profession: Today you should be very careful with your finances. It is also advisable to keep away from speculations.
prediction.luck: Unfortunately your stars are not favorable today and you might not receive the assistance you require.
prediction.personal_life: You may overlook your marital life and have a dispute with your life partner. Your habit of speaking without thinking may prove very harmful to you today.
prediction.travel: Travel, only if you must. Don’t get friendly with strangers.

prediction.health: Your health will suffer. Tendency to suffer from minor ailments like headaches, stomach pain, constipation are high. A small problem, if neglected, may grow into a serious one. It is advisable to consult a naturopath or alternative health practitioner.
prediction.emotions: You will find yourself feeling excessively emotional and responding to others in erratic ways.
prediction.profession: Be careful when dealing with funds, investments and finance. Unnecessary spending on wasteful items is indicated. You will have to bear more responsibilities at workplace.
prediction.luck: Time is not in your favor, so don't do anything depending on luck.
prediction.personal_life: Your partner will be under some stress, so be extra loving. Avoid third party interference in your personal or domestic matters. This is the time to clear all misunderstandings and resolve past differences with close friends.
prediction.travel: You will have to cancel your trip plans or holidays due to some unforeseen reasons.

prediction.health: You will feel active and happy the whole day. Beginning a new physical exercise regime and sporting activity will cause good health. Tendency to suffer from joints and muscular pain exists. However, there are no major health related issues to worry about.
prediction.emotions: This is a time of heightened yet manageable emotions. Increased sensitivity and warmth helps endear you to others.
prediction.profession: This is a good time for making business decisions, investments and dispute settlements. You shall have an edge over competitors. Job interview or negotiations will give good results. It's your time to be recognized and appreciated.
prediction.luck: There are a few pleasant surprises in store for you today. You will be able to achieve immense success even with small efforts.
prediction.personal_life: You will be more sympathetic to the feelings of others and shall freely share your own emotions with them. It’s a party time. Enjoy the day with family and friends. You may get an invitation to attend a social gathering.
prediction.travel: Traveling for professional purpose will prove very productive.

prediction.health: You will find yourself to be more robust and energetic. You are likely to take up a new natural health program. Eat a well balanced diet to keep yourself in good condition.
prediction.emotions: You are in the best of your moods and wear a carefree attitude for most part of the day. You will feel like taking part in entertaining and fun activities.
prediction.profession: Your creative talents will prove to be highly lucrative if put to proper use. Today can prove to be very productive for you. You will come up with new ideas and strategies. Financial position will be good.
prediction.luck: You are in the best of your moods and wear a carefree attitude for most part of the day. You will feel like taking part in entertaining and fun activities.
prediction.personal_life: Your passionate desires and romantic feelings are very strong now. Someone from your past is likely to contact you and make it a memorable day. Your energy level is high; this is a good time for team activities.
prediction.travel: You may engage in some religious activity or visit a spiritual place today.

prediction.health: A friend shall inspire you to adopt a higher level of physical fitness today. Make sure the food is nutritious and natural. Don’t indulge in overeating. Keep away from unhealthy habits.
prediction.emotions: You shall be in a friendly and cheerful mood today. You shall be in a mood to celebrate with your friends and family. You sense of happiness will be heightened.
prediction.profession: You will be full of enthusiasm and able to handle work efficiently. You can get new responsibilities which will prove to be beneficial for you. Monetary gains are indicated through your efforts.  Use your professional power to improve your career prospects.
prediction.luck: You will be successful in whatever you do. Today you shall get some good news about someone close to you.
prediction.personal_life: Family atmosphere will be cordial. Love relationships are strengthened. This is a good time to relax at home. Avoid all confrontations. There is a possibility of purchase of some household items.
prediction.travel: Travel will help you in overcoming your boredom for a short period. You’ll remain enthusiastic during traveling.

prediction.health: You need to take precautions against all sorts of allergies and viral infections today, though it will not be easy to avoid. Get immediate medical attention if you notice even a minor health problem.
prediction.emotions: You will have a tendency to act in a rather irrational, demanding way towards others.  You need to control your emotions and avoid doing anything that could deteriorate the situation.
prediction.profession: There may be difficult situations at work. People may harm your reputation and misunderstandings may occur. Sudden changes in work are also likely will increase pressure on you. This is not a good time to decide on new investments.
prediction.luck: This is not an auspicious time to venture into anything new. Things would not work in your favor.
prediction.personal_life: Romantic overtures will not pay. You will experience disappointment in love. Your family shall expect a lot from you which could annoy you. Try to be more calm and composed in your approach.
prediction.travel: This is not at all a good time for travelling. There shall be hindrances and you shall not gain anything out of the trips made.

prediction.health: Indigestion and pains may cause inconvenience. Eat reasonably as overeating is likely to cause a number of problems including stomach ailments today.  Changing diet may help you a lot. Try your hand at some sport or some other outdoor activity.
prediction.emotions: Listen to your inner voice today. This will help you in taking the right decisions.
prediction.profession: Today will be highly active and dynamic period at work. Heavy work along with responsibilities will test your patience and abilities. But ultimately, you will be able to prove your mettle and emerge a winner. Business will give good profits after a long gap.
prediction.luck: Your competitive disposition and perseverance will bring you luck. All you need to do is keep putting in your best.
prediction.personal_life: You will actively participate in some auspicious activities. Elder family members will visit you Family and friends get together will keep you busy. You may plan a surprise party to show your love and affection for your partner.
prediction.travel: Some of you may get an offer to travel abroad on work. You can start your planning now.

prediction.health: You may suffer from food related problems so be careful. You have to take special precaution against drinking water and other fluids.  Chances of water borne diseases are high. Poor health would demand some serious lifestyle changes.
prediction.emotions: Today, you will be so sensitive or grumpy due to which people will hesitate to interact with you.
prediction.profession: Don’t get into petty arguments at your work place. Do not start any new work today. You need to exercise caution in any type of transaction related to the business. This is not the right time to invest in the stock market.
prediction.luck: Time is not very favorable. However, if you persist with hard work, this bad luck spell of yours' will vanish.
prediction.personal_life: Domestic affairs will be a source of concern. Avoid arguing with your beloved as it may disturb your happy marriage life. There may be some disputes in the family.  Friends and relatives will help you out. You may be inclined towards spirituality.
prediction.travel: Short tours may disturb your work. You will not get the expected results from the trips.
